name: Sankalp Srivastava
title: Software Developer
bio: A collaborative and driven full-stack developer with hands-on experience building responsive web applications using React, Next.js, and Google Cloud. Passionate about solving real-world problems through scalable, user-centric solutions.

projects.title: Alumni Connect (SIH 2024)
projects.description: Developed a robust full-stack alumni networking platform aimed at bridging the gap between graduates and current students. The system supports over 1,000 users across various devices and features a smart mentorship-matching algorithm, dynamic user profiles, real-time scalable chat functionality using Firebase, and secure Google Cloud integration. The platform fosters community engagement and simplifies alumni-student interactions in educational ecosystems.

projects.title: AssistIQ (AICTE Approval)
projects.description: Designed and developed the frontend for an AICTE approval automation platform that streamlined the traditionally lengthy institutional application process. Leveraging Firebase, TailwindCSS, and an integrated chatbot, the system reduced multi-step form completion time by over 60% for more than 100 educational institutions. The user-centric interface and progressive enhancements ensured scalability, accessibility, and significant administrative cost savings.

projects.title: FusionX - Startup Support Platform
projects.description: Built a comprehensive cross-platform solution to connect startups with mentors and investors, focusing on accelerating early-stage growth and networking opportunities. The platform included tailored onboarding flows, dynamic user dashboards, and AI-curated recommendations. Conducted over 10 UX testing sessions, which helped improve usability and led to a 30% boost in task completion rates. It also featured modular components and scalable APIs for seamless integration and long-term sustainability.
